data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Allometopon Kertész (Diptera: Clusiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Owen Lonsdale (2016): Revision of the genus Allometopon Kertész (Diptera: Clusiidae). Zootaxa 4106 (1): 1-127, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4106.1.1
